Name: Problem Type
Module Selections.Description: Specifies the problem type to solve.

Name: Solver Type
Module Selections.Description: Specifies the solver algorithm to employ.

Name: Conduit Type
Module Selections.Description: Specifies the method for the model evaluations.

Name: Model Type
Module Selections.Description: Specifies the evaluation model type chosen, if any.

Name: Random Seed
General Settings.Description: Specifies the initializing seed for the generation of random numbers. If 0 is specified, Korali will automatically derivate a new seed base on the current time.

Name: Console Output
Verbosity
General Settings.Description: Specifies how much information will be displayed on console when running Korali.

Name: Console Output
Frequency
General Settings.Description: Specifies how often (in generations) will partial results be printed on console. The default, 1, indicates that every generation's results will be printed.

Name: Results Output
Path
General Settings.Description: Specifies the path of the results directory.

Name: Results Output
Frequency
General Settings.Description: Specifies how often (in generations) will partial result files be saved on the results directory. The default, 1, indicates that every generation's results will be saved.

Name: Timestamp
Internal Settings.Description: Indicates the current time when saving a result file.

Name: Run ID
Internal Settings.Description: Specifies the Korali run's unique identifier. Used to distinguish run results when two or more use the same output directory.

Name: Current Generation
Internal Settings.Description: Indicates the current generation in execution.

Name: Model Evaluation Count
Internal Settings.Description: Keeps track of how many model evaluations has the conduit performed so far.

Name: Is Finished
Internal Settings.Description: Indicates whether execution has reached a termination criterion.
